name: The Galactic Snub
description:
When humanity finally reaches the stars, we discover that all the aliens have been hanging out together in outer space-- WITHOUT US. What pieces of shit! We've been snubbed!

Hang out at some kinda space-ambassador cocktail party, pestering aliens and demanding explanations for their behavior. Decide whether or not to forgive them. Establish humanity in the Community of Space Peoples. Choose where we stand in galactic diplomacy. Enjoy excellent alien cocktail lounge ambiance by Travis Ford DeCastro.

Play The Galactic Snub online here.

Download the game for free below to gain access to its twine source files (Twine 1.4.2). Please feel free to cannibalize any of its code-- this project uses a variety of Javascript mods by both me and others. You can reach out to me on twitter at @lmichet if you have any questions!
